TopicTitle: Can anybody explain what happened to engine exhaust

Articles.Content:
What on Earth happened to the engine exhausts-

Mainsail Engine running at full throttle, yet what on Earth happened to the exhaust plume? It's so tiny. (this is just a random screenshot I took of the stock Ariane 5, I know this ascent profile is just horrible)

Problem just started with the new 1.11.1 update, and it effects every single engine in the game except the vector engine, and all the jet engines.

Is it just me that has this problem? Plz tell me cuz it seems like it's just a bug on my computer.

Edited February 6, 2021 by User_1234

Yeah that’s a bug with the new update. It’s already reported here.

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27233

omg I thought I was the only one.

From what I can tell, the plume looks the same from 50%-100% throttle, so what we see should be the throttle at 50%. Don't know if this bug applies to SRBs or jet engines.
